long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Web Radio is a tiny media player for listening your favorite radio cast via MP3 URL.

CHANGELOG
- Added auto-pause cast on streaming stalled.
- Added delete favorite.
- Added favorites control panel.
- Added sync favorite web radios. [MAX 10]
- Added equalizer graphic effect.
- Added media controls [Play/Pause/(Un)mute].
